law.text: It shall be unlawful for any weighman to misweigh or falsely report any weights or to otherwise fraudulently manipulate scales to produce a weight other than the true and actual weight of any livestock consigned to and sold at any stockyard or buying station.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 9, effective June 17, 1954.
